previewArticle.title: Sporting Kansas City vs. FC Dallas | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: Sporting Kansas City 1, FC Dallas 1 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: The defending MLS champions make their 2014 home debut when Sporting Kansas City meet FC Dallas at Sporting Park.
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: Sporting KC vs. FC Dallas

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Brian Comiskey
timelineItems.text: Game on! #SKC

timelineItems.name: Kaitlin Marsh Blake
timelineItems.text: We defend together! #SportingKC #everybody http://t.co/XSURJFI22O

timelineItems.name: Kaitlin Marsh Blake
timelineItems.text: We defend together! #SportingKC #everybody http://t.co/XSURJFI22O

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Sporting Kansas City. Conceded by Stephen Keel.

timelineItems.name: Kelli Hemstock
timelineItems.text: If anyone is wondering what watching pro soccer in KC is like...it's similar to Lambeau Field...ON SPEED! This is absolutely INSANE. #SKC!

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Sal Zizzo (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Dominic Dwyer.

timelineItems.name: ThisIsSporting.com
timelineItems.text: And a great chance for #SportingKC gets saved out for a deep throw. Fans wanted a PK.

timelineItems.name: Stephen Fortschneider
timelineItems.text: Benny #sportingkc

timelineItems.name: Eric Tomik
timelineItems.text: Zizzo looking strong to start this game #SKC

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Sporting Kansas City. Conceded by Matt Hedges.

timelineItems.name: Kevin Hogue
timelineItems.text: Why does the eastern half of the pitch look so terrible? #SportingKC

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Sporting Kansas City. Conceded by Matt Hedges.

timelineItems.name: DallasBurn
timelineItems.text: come defense get it together, play as a team. Doing good but..#DTID #FCD

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Fabian Castillo (FC Dallas).

timelineItems.name: John Zetmeir
timelineItems.text: SKC continues to knock on the door here early. Completely dominating FC Dallas, now they just need to get on the scoreboard #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Nicholas Weber
timelineItems.text: #SportingKC goal feels imminent. They are totally dominating possession so far.

timelineItems.comment: Andrew Jacobson (FC Dallas) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by C.J. Sapong (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: Eden Olson
timelineItems.text: Opening day #SportingKC #SKCvDAL http://t.co/sBcka67GNC

timelineItems.name: Eden Olson
timelineItems.text: Opening day #SportingKC #SKCvDAL http://t.co/sBcka67GNC

timelineItems.comment: Andrew Jacobson (FC Dallas) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: Fred
timelineItems.text: Lots of defense from FC Dallas rn. I think they're scared. #SKC

timelineItems.name: Nate Brinson
timelineItems.text: Dallas have had to #DEEF the whole game. #SportingKC #skcvfcd

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Sporting Kansas City. Conceded by Kellyn Acosta.

timelineItems.name: LU-E-Z
timelineItems.text: Zizzo is turning into one of my favorite players on the #SKC Roster �

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: #FCDallas pressing only sliiiiiightly less than Cruz Azul on Wednesday night. #SportingKC won't have to cross midfield if they don't want.

timelineItems.name: Kyle Hill
timelineItems.text: Dear #SKCTV: now THAT's what I call crowd noise! The @KCCauldron are alive tonight! #SportingKC #SKCvFCD

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Oriol Rosell (Sporting Kansas City).
Mauro Díaz (FC Dallas) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Kevin Hogue
timelineItems.text: I really like Jimmy Medranda. Doesn't lose possession as much as Olum which is really nice. #SportingKC

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, Sporting Kansas City 1, FC Dallas 1.

timelineItems.name: Jean Neuberger
timelineItems.text: Rough for #SKC. Domination possession, were the much better team, but awful officiating made this one a draw.

timelineItems.name: Evan Deatherage
timelineItems.text: That is a golden point earned by @FCDallas way to go boys #DTID

timelineItems.name: Rich Young
timelineItems.text: Bigger game Wednesday. #ccl #skc #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Alpha Arbitrage
timelineItems.text: @SportingKC We have to stop giving up late goals. Last two matches compromised by late goals. Great match, hard earned point. #SportingKC

timelineItems.desc: The defending MLS champions make their 2014 home debut when Sporting Kansas City meet FC Dallas at Sporting Park.

timelineItems.text: I like the Bieler sub. Hope he can put one in the net. #SportingKC needs a goal.

timelineItems.name: Ian James
timelineItems.text: Bieler flopping...gosh didnt see that coming #Sportingkc

timelineItems.name: Megan Hinman
timelineItems.text: "Along comes Cloudy Old Bieler." Wait, what? Oh. Claudio Bieler. Announcers and their accents. Sigh. #SKCvDAL

timelineItems.desc: FC Dallas have a good opportunity off the corner but Castillo knocks it high and wide.
timelineItems.title: Castillo drives the loose ball over the bar

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Fabian Castillo (FC Dallas) right footed shot from outside the box is too high following a corner.
Jacob Peterson (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Je-Vaughn Watson (FC Dallas).

timelineItems.name: Ed Rowe
timelineItems.text: #SKC phoning in the early MLS season in favor of CONCACAF Champions League. Should rebate tix.

timelineItems.name: Cory Jensen
timelineItems.text: Some heroic defending there from Hedges. #fcdallas #SKCvDAL

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Andrew Jacobson (FC Dallas).
Jimmy Medranda (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: Little Jimmy Medranda is involved in EVERYTHING. Fans are going to warm up to him real quick. #SportingKC #SKCvFCD

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Seth Sinovic (Sporting Kansas City) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the bottom left corner.
timelineItems.title: SAVE:  Seitz comes up big on the line drive by Sinovic

timelineItems.name: Fabian Troche
timelineItems.text: Felicitaciones a mi amigo que entra en su debut #davidtexeira #FCD #MLS

timelineItems.name: Justin Rizzo
timelineItems.text: Beautiful night for a game. The atmosphere in here is crazy! #sportingkc

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Sporting Kansas City 1, FC Dallas 0. Aurelien Collin (Sporting Kansas City) header from the center of the box to the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Collin bangs in a header off the corner to give SKC the lead

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Seth Sinovic (Sporting Kansas City) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the bottom left corner.
Corner,  Sporting Kansas City. Conceded by Chris Seitz.

timelineItems.name: Ian James
timelineItems.text: Yet another great stop by collin right there #Sportingkc man of the match so far

timelineItems.name: Connor Pence
timelineItems.text: And he does it again. @ampC2 #SportingKC

timelineItems.comment: Fabian Castillo (FC Dallas) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 5 - @FCDallas have lost 5 consecutive road openers in @MLS, and have won just 2 out of 18 in their @MLS history. Trip. #SKCvDAL

timelineItems.text: 4- @SportingKC have been issued 4 red cards in the last 8 @MLS meetings with @FCDallas. Bruising. #SKCvDAL

timelineItems.text: Nice to have that trump card — a center back to score your goals — when you can't ever break an opponent down. #SportingKC #SKCvFCD

timelineItems.name: Mike Kuhn
timelineItems.text: We're #SportingKC, only our defenders score

timelineItems.name: Ed Rowe
timelineItems.text: Feilhaber put some English on that ball but it was the French ending that caused the goal. #SkC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Mechack Jerome (Sporting Kansas City).
Andrés Escobar (FC Dallas) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: Aaron Lewis
timelineItems.text: Gooooooaaalll!!!!! Collins with a beautiful header!! #sportingkc

timelineItems.name: Halil Hajdarevic
timelineItems.text: #sportingkc #homeopener #Skc @melissaedwards17

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Fabian Castillo (FC Dallas).
Alex Martinez (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: Cassie Hutchison
timelineItems.text: GOOOAAAAALLLLL #SportingKC! http://t.co/RrtyHANaqZ

timelineItems.name: Cassie Hutchison
timelineItems.text: GOOOAAAAALLLLL #SportingKC! http://t.co/RrtyHANaqZ

timelineItems.name: Christopher Dunn
timelineItems.text: Okay, I take it back! I'm sold on #23 's sweet moves #SportingKC

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Claudio Bieler (Sporting Kansas City) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Benjamin Winters
timelineItems.text: Martinez had a nervy start, but has settled in well. #SportingKC

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Jonathan
timelineItems.text: More than any #DCU player in 36 RT @thomasfloyd10: Dating back to last year's playoffs, four goals in seven games for Aurelien Collin. #SKC

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Sporting Kansas City 1, FC Dallas 1. Matt Hedges (FC Dallas) header from the center of the box to the top right corner.
timelineItems.title: GOAL:  Hedges knocks in the equalizer off the free kick

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Oriol Rosell (Sporting Kansas City).
David Texeira (FC Dallas) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Tim Buckholz
timelineItems.text: Dallas looks afraid to leave their half #SKCvDAL

timelineItems.name: Ed Rowe
timelineItems.text: Yup, we are getting closer to the European Leagues. At least with all the flopping. #MLS #SKCvDAL

timelineItems.name: J.B. Bauersfeld
timelineItems.text: FC Dallas just popped in SKC's punch bowl. What a bummer. #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Small Time Sports
timelineItems.text: Bieler may want that minute he rolled around for back now. #DTID

timelineItems.desc: Attempt blocked. Alex Martinez (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked.
timelineItems.title: Martinez has his shot cleared away

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Sporting Kansas City. Conceded by Chris Seitz.

timelineItems.name: Thomas Floyd
timelineItems.text: Have to give it to Oscar Pareja - brings on Michel late and the Brazilian immediately serves up the equalizer on a set piece. #FCD

timelineItems.name: Heather KCSports Fan
timelineItems.text: WOW another late goal conceded by #SportingKC, not a good start to the season. Not placing blame anywhere but not a fan of this goalkeeper

timelineItems.desc: Attempt blocked. Aurelien Collin (Sporting Kansas City) header from the center of the box is blocked.
timelineItems.title: Collin's header in extra time is cleared away

timelineItems.comment: Alex Martinez (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Andrés Escobar (FC Dallas).
Attempt blocked. Alex Martinez (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Seth Sinovic.
Corner,  Sporting Kansas City. Conceded by Matt Hedges.
Attempt blocked. Aurélien Collin (Sporting Kansas City) header from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Benny Feilhaber with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Matt Terrill
timelineItems.text: #SportingKC Giving away goals after 85 mins like Oprah giving away cars. You get a goal! And you get a goal!

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City) header from the center of the box is too high.
timelineItems.title: Feilhaber's last second header bounds over the bar

timelineItems.comment: Alex Martinez (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Andrés Escobar (FC Dallas).
Corner,  Sporting Kansas City. Conceded by Je-Vaughn Watson.

timelineItems.name: Fake Adrian Hanauer
timelineItems.text: I’ll understand if Peter Vermes develops an eye twitch during stoppage. #SKCvDAL

timelineItems.name: Kristi Colvin
timelineItems.text: And this blob of red, my friends, is #fcdallas celebrating after scoring. :-( 1-1 #skcvdal  90 min and there is chaos near the box as #SKC is trying to come ahead again

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City) header from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Matt Besler.
Offside, FC Dallas. Stephen Keel tries a through ball, but Fabian Castillo is caught offside.
Foul by Blas Pérez (FC Dallas).
Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Ryan Schneider
timelineItems.text: Welp, same story as last year. Also, when come the officials come back out to play, @mls? #SportingKC

timelineItems.comment: Second Half ends, Sporting Kansas City 1, FC Dallas 1.

timelineItems.name: David Gear
timelineItems.text: Can't believe we got a point out of that mess. #DTID #RedFor90
